name: id
description: Description: The ID of the Role in the database.

name: name
description: Description: The name of the role.

name: color
description: Description: The hex code assigned to this role. If no hex code is assigned, the string will be empty.

name: permissions
description: Description: A bitmask that represents the sum of all permissions granted to the role.

name: highlighted
description: Description: Whether the role is publicly visible as a badge on user profiles.
